active_incidents.title: Users may be experiencing issues uploading files.

notes.body: We’re still actively investigating an issue uploading files. All workspace users may experience trouble uploading files. We’ll provide another update as soon as we have more information to share.

We’re still actively investigating an issue uploading files. Both all workspace users may experience trouble uploading files. We’ll provide another update as soon as we have more information to share.
We’re looking into an issue where Guests in a workspace are unable to upload files and we’ll let you know as we learn more. Thank you for bearing with us in the meantime.
